name: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (official trailer)
description: The lord of the Ring is an epic high-fantasy novel written by English author J. R. R. Tolkien. The story began as a sequel to Tolkien's 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, but eventually developed into a much larger work.
